task.summary: Default task
Created Crime, CrimeFragment, and fragment_crime.xml Modified activity_crime to make space for the fragment. Create a text listener in CrimeFragment to set new crime title.
Create the Crime Fragment and begin transaction.
Create landscape layout and added capability to serialize Crime.

Created a ListFragment implementation and moved activity_fragment.xml and associated abstract class SimpleFragmentActivity to a library. Included the library in the POM file. Set up CrimeLab and created a list fragment that will display the crime list (no data yet)

Added a custom CrimeAdapter and configured it to display custom crime data in a list view Created custom layout for list item, called crime_list_item.xml Configured CrimeAdapter to call customized Crime method that displays the date in a formatted String
Changed package name Set up ActivityFragment to properly display a Crime using Fragment Arguments Hooked up onResume in CrimeListFragment to tell the list to update when an activity is changed.
Added a CrimePagerActivity for paging through a list of crimes
Added a DatePickerDialog and hooked up the transfer of crime date to dialog result. Added target JDK version to POM file.
Added a TimePickerFragment and a second button to select the time
Combined the Date/Time picker into a single button action, presenting a dialog asking the user what they want to set.
Added an options menu and enabled adding a new crime Declared meta-data in the manifest and enabled the use of NavUtils for performing ancestral navigation
Added a new layout that specifies an empty view for the list adapter
Added save/load feature using JSON format to private storage area
Added an options menu that allows the user to select between external and device storage Implemented a StorageManager for handling calls to the API re: ability to write to the specified storage.
Added a floating and multi-choice context menu for deleting crimes. Added a state select list item for handling background color of items selected in multi-choice mode.
Added a context menu to CrimeFragment that allows the user to delete a crime from the details view, not just from the list.
Added camera preview capability with CrimeCameraFragment.
Added ability to take picture and save to random filename
Added ability to pass filename back to calling fragment do so something with later.
Added ability to display photo thumbnail in an image view Added code to display and scale the image, and clean up when the activity is started and stopped, respectively.
